com.kloudtek.systyrant.annotation

Annotation Type Service


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,PARAMETER,TYPE})
public @interface Service

    This annotation can be used to indicate classes to be registered as services ServiceManager.registerService(String, Object), or to inject a service into a java resource implementation (a class annotated with STResource)

    • When used to annotate a class type, it will create an object of the annotated class type (or of the class type specified in def() if specified), and register it using ServiceManager.registerService(String, Object). The name will be value() if specified, otherwise it will use the annotated class name converted to lower case.
    • When used to annotate a field in a java resource implementation, it will find the relevant service and inject it. ServiceManager.getService(String) will be used if value() is set, or otherwise it will use ServiceManager.getService(Class) with the field's name as parameter.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class def
      Service implementation class (if left as default the class of annotated type will be used).
      java.lang.String value
      Service name (if not set the class name lower cased will be used)

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        Service name (if not set the class name lower cased will be used)
        Returns:
        Service name
        Default:
        ""

      • def

        public abstract java.lang.Class def
        Service implementation class (if left as default the class of annotated type will be used). Only valid on annotated class types, otherwise has no effect.
        Returns:
        Default service implementation class (if class ServiceManager then it means the class of annotated type should be used)
        Default:
        com.kloudtek.systyrant.ServiceManager.class
